original_title: I Am Alive: Surviving the Andes Plane Crash
overview: On Friday, the 13th of October, 1972, a charter plane carrying 45 passengers, including a college rugby team, vanished over the desolate, snow-covered Andes Mountains. For 72 days, the world thought they were dead.
title: I Am Alive: Surviving the Andes Plane Crash
